name: CoCo Cosmic Aliens
description:
Cosmic Aliens for the Color Computer 1, 2, 3 and Dragon is now available for downloading! There is a standard CoCo DSK image and a Dragon hybrid DSK that should run on a Dragon or Coco.

Written and running in BASIC this has been a labor of love in trying to recreate a lost memory of mine, I hope you'll enjoy.

Send feedback to ogStevieStrow@gmail.com and follow the past, present and future of the project at http://cosmicaliens.com
